  • Constructor Details

    • GroupMessageBean

      public GroupMessageBean()

  • Method Details

    • sendGroupMessage

      public GroupMessageEntity sendGroupMessage(GroupMessageSendDto groupMessageSendDto) throws UserNotFoundException, EntityNotFoundException
      Sends a group message from a sender to a project group.
      Parameters:
      groupMessageSendDto - The DTO containing the sender ID, group ID, and message content.
      Returns:
      The GroupMessageEntity representing the sent group message.
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - If no user is found with the specified sender ID.
      EntityNotFoundException - If no project is found with the specified group ID.

    • getGroupMessagesByProjectId

      public List<GroupMessageGetDto> getGroupMessagesByProjectId(long projectId, jakarta.ws.rs.core.SecurityContext securityContext) throws UserNotFoundException
      Retrieves all group messages associated with a project identified by projectId.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project for which group messages are to be retrieved.
      securityContext - The security context providing access to the authenticated user.
      Returns:
      A list of GroupMessageGetDto objects representing group messages for the specified project.
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - If no user is found for the authenticated user ID.

    • getGroupMessagesByMessageIds

      public List<GroupMessageGetDto> getGroupMessagesByMessageIds(List<Long> messageIds)
      Retrieves group messages based on a list of message IDs.
      Parameters:
      messageIds - The list of message IDs to retrieve group messages from.
      Returns:
      A list of GroupMessageGetDto objects representing group messages for the specified message IDs.

    • markMessageAsReadByUser

      public void markMessageAsReadByUser(Long messageId, Long userId)
      Marks a group message as read by a specific user.
      Parameters:
      messageId - The ID of the group message to mark as read.
      userId - The ID of the user who is marking the message as read.

    • verifyMessagesAsReadForGroup

      public boolean verifyMessagesAsReadForGroup(List<Long> messageIds, Long userId)
      Verifies if all specified messages are marked as read for a user.
      Parameters:
      messageIds - The list of message IDs to verify as read.
      userId - The ID of the user to verify message readings for.
      Returns:
      true if all specified messages are marked as read by the user, false otherwise.

    • convertGroupMessageEntityToGroupMessageGetDto

      public GroupMessageGetDto convertGroupMessageEntityToGroupMessageGetDto(GroupMessageEntity groupMessageEntity)
      Converts a GroupMessageEntity to a GroupMessageGetDto.
      Parameters:
      groupMessageEntity - The GroupMessageEntity to convert.
      Returns:
      A GroupMessageGetDto representing the converted GroupMessageEntity.

    • convertGroupMessageEntityListToGroupMessageGetDtoList

      public List<GroupMessageGetDto> convertGroupMessageEntityListToGroupMessageGetDtoList(List<GroupMessageEntity> groupMessageEntities)
      Converts a list of GroupMessageEntity objects to a list of GroupMessageGetDto objects.
      Parameters:
      groupMessageEntities - The list of GroupMessageEntity objects to convert.
      Returns:
      A list of GroupMessageGetDto objects representing the converted GroupMessageEntity objects.
